name: 2023 9th International Conference on Environment and Renewable Energy
content: Paper Publishing: Papers submitted to ICERE 2023 will go through peer reviewing process by international experts. Only accepted papers will be published into Springer Book Series Earth and Environmental Sciences(Electronic ISSN 2524-3438;Print ISSN 2524-342X). The proceedings will be sent to Scopus and other databases for abstracting and indexing. The book series is now indexed by Scopus.
